slide.title: Execution trace to file
slide.example: xdebug.auto_trace=1 ; enable tracing xdebug.auto_trace_file=/tmp/trace ; configure tracefile xdebug.collect_params=0 ; disable parameter collection xdebug.collect_include_files=1 ; enable collecting filenames to include xdebug.extended_info=0 ; disable 'extended' code generation xdebug.show_mem_delta=1 ; show difference in memory usage before ; and after call
